metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8283 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
dpkg-source in dpkg 1.3.0 through 1.18.23 is able to use a non-GNU patchprogram and does not offer a protection mechanism for blank-indented diffhunks, which allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacksvia a crafted Debian source package, as demonstrated by use of dpkg-sourceon NetBSD.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dpkg - 1.18.24ubuntu1
dselect - 1.18.24ubuntu1
libdpkg-perl - 1.18.24ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dpkg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.18.24ubuntu1').
